alert.note: Alert for Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 8:28PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pemiscot, northwestern Obion and Lake Counties through 900 PM CST... At 827 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Cottonwood Grove, or 8 miles northeast of Hayti, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
